name: Epic Gamer Quest
description: Megabros Coryplaygames aka Cory and Matededdneddy aka Mathew get sent to a strange land where they alongside the Eds who also got teleported to this strange land known as Epic Gamestoon where they are told by a mysterious man named Samuel that they must find the 4 keys to unlock the gate to the castle which has been taken over by some guy they don’t know about who henchmen consist of Cluckles, Starlord,  Kua Kua, the kankers, Eddy’s brother, and Barney the dinosaur. Also there is a prophecy that foretold a legendary epic gamer which according to Samuel might be Cory and that the edboys are his guardians as for Mathew well he’s mostly just along for the ride as Cory’s bestie.
